frames.caption: A warm candle glows softly on a wooden windowsill, accompanied by a vase of delicate pink flowers. The window offers a breathtaking view of a vibrant sunset over rolling hills and distant mountains.
frames.description: The scene captures a tranquil moment indoors, with a focus on a candlelit setting by a window. Outside, the sun sets over a picturesque landscape, casting a warm glow through the glass.

frames.caption: A warm candle glows on a rustic wooden windowsill, casting a gentle light on a vase of delicate flowers. Beyond the window, a breathtaking sunset paints the sky in vibrant hues of orange and pink over distant mountains.
frames.description: The scene captures a tranquil moment indoors with a focus on a lit candle and flowers by a window, overlooking a scenic sunset view of mountains.

summary: Objects: candle, vase, flowers, windowsill, window. Nature: sunset, mountains, hills. Emotions: tranquility, warmth, calm, serene. Scenes: indoor, landscape, sunset view. Concepts: serenity, coziness
